answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!There is a possibility that you have either too much protein breakdown or diabetes. Please test urine for protein and get your blood sugar checked both fasting and two hours after food. Also there is a possibility of foreign body in nose.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: I have a question...As of lately I have had weird, unexplained episodes of smelling fermented or sour yeast. It is not a female thing, it is a smell only I smell, and it has been happening several times a day. I have asked family and friends if they can smell it too, but they just look at me weird. lol It is really starting to bug me.. HELP!
title: Strange Smell
